description: Dore amasaha n'amaradio ikiganiro NN kinyuriraho
title: Umva Ni Nyampinga buri gihe!
content: Kurikira ikiganiro Ni Nyampinga buri wa Gatatu na buri wa Gatanu saa kumi n'ebyiri na cumi n'itanu z'umugoroba (18:15), hamwe no kuwa Gatandatu saa munani z'amanywa (14:00). Ni kuri RADIYO RWANDA, RC MUSANZE, RC RUSIZI, ISHINGIRO, ISANGANO, IZUBA na HUGUKA.
